name: Promise by the Shore
description:
Clean up the beach and help the turtle eggs to hatch safely to keep an old promise to your beloved dead wife. The game has 2 different stages with cutscenes and ending :)

WASD - Move
K - Interact
L - Return

Pick up the trash around the shore and dispose of it at recycle bins or take it home to craft new tools.

Bins:
Gray - Wood
Blue - Metal
Green - Glass
Yellow - Plastic

======

This mini game is a submission to the I can't Draw But Want to Make a Game (Again) Jam. It was made in 4 days since we arrived late. There are some things that I'd like to perfect but it was the best we could do within 4 days and with a single pc to do both art and programming.

The art was made by my wife, who has zero experience with art whatsoever and had to learn on the go (the naif style looks really cute though).

Art by Marisa Torres
Programming & Design by Kayo Torres
Music by Guilherme Calzado
